title: Forkmods boost wheel compatibility with 20×110 to 15×110 axle conversion kits
content:
The latest from Forkmods is a simple yet brilliant piece of kit that will save you an unknowable number of dollars on a new front wheel, or an unknowable amount of time lacing your rim to a new hub. The Forkmods 20×110 to 15×110 axle conversion kit will allow riders to fit a Boost (15x110mm) […]

The post Forkmods boost wheel compatibility with 20×110 to 15×110 axle conversion kits appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
